name: Building organization-wide governance and re-use for CI/CD and automation with GitHub Actions | The GitHub Blog
summary: Many of us are aware of the benefits that a strong focus on automation can bring, particularly in our development workflow and DevOps lifecycle. But silos across businesses can lead to duplication of effort, and potential to lose out on best practices. In this post, weâ€™ll explore how CI/CD can be shared across your entire organization alongside policies, for a well-governed experience with GitHub Actions.
